quotes.title: Focus
quotes.quote: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
quotes.author: ~ Tim Ferriss ~

quotes.title: Time Management
quotes.quote: You may delay, but time will not.
quotes.author: ~ Benjamin Franklin ~

quotes.title: Hard Work
quotes.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
quotes.author: ~ Vidal Sassoon ~

quotes.title: Perseverance
quotes.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: ~ Robert Collier ~

quotes.title: Procrastination
quotes.quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: ~ Zig Ziglar ~

quotes.title: Consistency
quotes.quote: Small disciplines repeated with consistency every day lead to great achievements.
quotes.author: ~ John C. Maxwell ~

quotes.title: Success Mindset
quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: ~ Walt Disney ~

quotes.title: Goals
quotes.quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
quotes.author: ~ Tony Robbins ~

quotes.title: Self-Improvement
quotes.quote: Be so busy improving yourself that you have no time to criticize others.
quotes.author: ~ Chetan Bhagat ~

quotes.title: Learning
quotes.quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
quotes.author: ~ Mahatma Gandhi ~

quotes.title: Resilience
quotes.quote: Do not judge me by my success, judge me by how many times I fell down and got back up again.
quotes.author: ~ Nelson Mandela ~

quotes.title: Growth Mindset
quotes.quote: Change is the end result of all true learning.
quotes.author: ~ Leo Buscaglia ~

quotes.title: Self-Reflection
quotes.quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
quotes.author: ~ Aristotle ~

quotes.title: Courage
quotes.quote: What you are afraid to do is a clear indication of the next thing you need to do.
quotes.author: ~ Ralph Waldo Emerson ~

quotes.title: Discipline
quotes.quote: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
quotes.author: ~ Abraham Lincoln ~

quotes.title: Overcoming Fear
quotes.quote: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it.
quotes.author: ~ Nelson Mandela ~

quotes.title: Friendships
quotes.quote: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
quotes.author: ~ Walter Winchell ~

quotes.title: Love
quotes.quote: We are shaped and fashioned by those we love.
quotes.author: ~ Johann Wolfgang von Goethe ~

quotes.title: Trust
quotes.quote: Trust is built when actions meet words.
quotes.author: ~ Chris Butler ~

quotes.title: Family Bonds
quotes.quote: Family is not an important thing. It’s everything.
quotes.author: ~ Michael J. Fox ~

quotes.title: Communication
quotes.quote: The most important thing in communication is hearing what isn’t said.
quotes.author: ~ Peter Drucker ~

quotes.title: Forgiveness
quotes.quote: To forgive is to set a prisoner free and discover that the prisoner was you.
quotes.author: ~ Lewis B. Smedes ~

quotes.title: Empathy
quotes.quote: When you start to develop your powers of empathy, life becomes better.
quotes.author: ~ Oprah Winfrey ~

quotes.title: Respect
quotes.quote: If we lose love and self-respect for each other, this is how we finally die.
quotes.author: ~ Maya Angelou ~

quotes.title: Self-Worth
quotes.quote: You are enough just as you are.
quotes.author: ~ Meghan Markle ~

quotes.title: Body Positivity
quotes.quote: To love yourself right now, just as you are, is to give yourself heaven.
quotes.author: ~ Alan Cohen ~

quotes.title: Inner Strength
quotes.quote: You never know how strong you are until being strong is your only choice.
quotes.author: ~ Bob Marley ~

quotes.title: Authenticity
quotes.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: ~ Oscar Wilde ~

quotes.title: Self-Belief
quotes.quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
quotes.author: ~ Theodore Roosevelt ~

quotes.title: Overcoming Insecurity
quotes.quote: Confidence comes not from always being right, but from not fearing to be wrong.
quotes.author: ~ Peter T. McIntyre ~

quotes.title: Self-Respect
quotes.quote: Respect yourself enough to walk away from anything that no longer serves you.
quotes.author: ~ Robert Tew ~

quotes.title: Self-Compassion
quotes.quote: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
quotes.author: ~ Buddha ~

quotes.title: Action
quotes.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: ~ William James ~

quotes.title: Persistence
quotes.quote: The secret of success is to do the common things uncommonly well.
quotes.author: ~ John D. Rockefeller ~

quotes.title: Dreams
quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: ~ Walt Disney ~

quotes.title: Success
quotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: ~ Henry David Thoreau ~

quotes.title: Overcoming Challenges
quotes.quote: The harder the conflict, the greater the triumph.
quotes.author: ~ George Washington ~

quotes.title: Inspiration
quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: ~ Ralph Waldo Emerson ~

quotes.title: Confidence
quotes.quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.
quotes.author: ~ Henry Ford ~

quotes.title: Goals
quotes.quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
quotes.author: ~ Antoine de Saint-Exupéry ~

quotes.title: Daily Gratitude
quotes.quote: The more you practice gratitude, the more there is to be grateful for.
quotes.author: ~ Unknown ~

quotes.title: Small Joys
quotes.quote: Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.
quotes.author: ~ Robert Brault ~

quotes.title: Present Moment
quotes.quote: The present moment is all you ever have.
quotes.author: ~ Eckhart Tolle ~

quotes.title: Health
quotes.quote: It is health that is real wealth and not pieces of gold and silver.
quotes.author: ~ Mahatma Gandhi ~

quotes.title: Life’s Beauty
quotes.quote: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it.
quotes.author: ~ Richard Bach ~

quotes.title: Nature’s Peace
quotes.quote: In every walk with nature, one receives far more than he seeks.
quotes.author: ~ John Muir ~

quotes.title: Blessings
quotes.quote: Some people grumble that roses have thorns; I am grateful that thorns have roses.
quotes.author: ~ Alphonse Karr ~

quotes.title: Opportunities
quotes.quote: Opportunities are usually disguised as hard work, so most people don’t recognize them.
quotes.author: ~ Ann Landers ~
